a1.name: Arrow of Rebuke
a1.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Removes 1 random debuff from this Champion and places it on the target.

a2.name: Mass Impalement
a2.notes: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of placing a 60% Decrease DEF debuff for 2 turns.

a3.name: Divine Wrath
a3.notes: Attacks all enemies. Damage is proportional to either this Champion’s ATK or the target’s DEF or ATK stat, whichever is highest. Deals an extra 30% C.DMG if the target’s ATK is highest. Ignores 30% of the target’s DEF if the target’s DEF is highest.

booking.notes: Books increase damage, debuff chance, and reduce cooldowns.

damage_per_turn.a3: Very high AoE burst, especially against high DEF/ATK targets

rotation.average_damage: High in Arena and Dungeons, moderate in CB

scenarios.notes: Maximizes burst on A3, especially against high DEF/ATK targets
Adds extra damage on A1/A2, but not optimal for CB role
Best for boss nuking, especially Dragon and Fire Knight

clan_boss.notes: AoE damage is good, but lacks debuffs and utility for Clan Boss. Not recommended for main CB team.

synergy.relentless_viability: Not recommended; skill set does not benefit from extra turns

investment.notes: Top-tier for AoE nuking and DEF Down. Excels in Arena and Dungeons.

owned_comparison.comparison: Trunda is a stronger AOE nuker, Abbess brings DEF Down.
Foli offers more survivability, Abbess has better AoE burst.

draft_logic.notes: Excellent first or counter-pick for AoE teams.

gear_set_stability.Reflex: Not recommended; no valuable skills to cycle
gear_set_stability.Relentless: Not recommended; no extra turn synergy

utility_comparison.comparison: Trunda outperforms Abbess in AOE damage, Abbess brings DEF Down.
Foli brings more survivability, Abbess has better AoE burst.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Helmsmasher for Arena, Warmaster for PvE
final_summary.booking_impact: High; books help but not mandatory
final_summary.damage_rotation: Open with A2 for DEF Down, A3 for AoE burst
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize ATK, C.DMG, SPD, ACC; Savage set for nuking
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Works best with ATK buffers and debuffers
final_summary.draft_value: First or counter-pick for AoE teams
final_summary.investment_value: High; top-tier for AoE nuking and DEF Down

team_setups.name: Arena AoE Nuking Team
team_setups.strategy: Speed boost, ATK up, DEF down, then Abbess A2/A3 for AoE nuke

similar_champions.similarity_reason: Both are single-target/utility nukers with high ATK scaling
